text.div:
This value set contains 6 concepts

ProvenanceParticipantRole

The role that a provenance participant played

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/provenance-participant-role

CodeDefinitionComments
enterer A person entering the data into the originating systemThe data entry person is collected optionally for internal quality control purposes. This includes the transcriptionist for dictated text
performer A person, animal, organization or device that who actually and principally carries out the activityDevice should only be assigned as a performer in circumstances where the device is performing independent of human intervention. Need not be the principal responsible actor
author A party that originates the resource and therefore has responsibility for the information given in the resource and ownership of this resourceEvery resource should have an author
verifier A person who verifies the correctness and appropriateness of activityThis is often used in association with the institution that hosts an activity
attester A verifier who attests to the accuracy of the resource
informant A person who reported information that contributed to the resourcee.g., a next of kin who answers questions about the patient's history

name: ProvenanceParticipantRole
description: The role that a provenance participant played

extension.valueString: The data entry person is collected optionally for internal quality control purposes. This includes the transcriptionist for dictated text

concept.definition: A person entering the data into the originating system

extension.valueString: Device should only be assigned as a performer in circumstances where the device is performing independent of human intervention. Need not be the principal responsible actor

concept.definition: A person, animal, organization or device that who actually and principally carries out the activity

extension.valueString: Every resource should have an author

concept.definition: A party that originates the resource and therefore has responsibility for the information given in the resource and ownership of this resource

extension.valueString: This is often used in association with the institution that hosts an activity

concept.definition: A person who verifies the correctness and appropriateness of activity
A verifier who attests to the accuracy of the resource

extension.valueString: e.g., a next of kin who answers questions about the patient's history

concept.definition: A person who reported information that contributed to the resource
